title: New: Ecstasy – Melt
content:
Elusive London outfit Ecstasy have made it six out of six with their new track, Melt, moving further from the distinctive pop of FRNDS 4 LYF or Exhale, and pulling upon their shoegaze inspirations.

It’s still got markings of the M83 / Passion Pit stadium filing anthems, but there’s something really intoxicating about it. Probably less likely to feature on Popjustice as their previous tracks, it’s fascinating to see the variety that Ecstasy have in their locker. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
